description: Allows the mob to lay an egg block on a sand block if the mob is pregnant.
title: Lay Egg

speed_multiplier.title: Speed Multiplier
speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal.

search_range.title: Search Range
search_range.description: The distance in blocks it will look for a sand block to move towards.

search_height.title: Search Height
search_height.description: Height in blocks the mob will look for sand block to move towards.

search_count.title: Search Count
search_count.description: The number of blocks each tick that the mob will check within it's search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

goal_radius.title: Goal Radius
goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the 'wiggle room' to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot.

on_lay.title: Event: On Lay
on_lay.description: Event to run when this mob lays the egg.

allow_laying_from_below.title: Allow Laying From Below
allow_laying_from_below.description: Allows the mob to lay its eggs from below the target if it can't get there. This is useful if the target block is water with air above, since mobs may not be able to get to the air block above water.

egg_type.title: Egg Type
egg_type.description: Block type for the egg to lay. If this is a turtle egg, the number of eggs in the block is randomly set.

lay_egg_sound.title: Lay Egg Sound Event
lay_egg_sound.description: Sound event name for laying egg. Defaulted to lay_egg which is used for Turtles.

lay_seconds.title: Lay Seconds
lay_seconds.description: Duration of the laying egg process in seconds.

target_blocks.title: Target Blocks
target_blocks.description: Blocks that the mob can lay its eggs on top of.

target_materials_above_block.title: Target Materials Above Block
target_materials_above_block.description: Types of materials that can exist above the target block.

use_default_animation.title: Use Default Animation
use_default_animation.description: Specifies if the default lay-egg animation should be played when the egg is placed or not.
